    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword (User u, char[] oldPassword, char[] newPassword, char[] currentSessionId)
      Method to change one's password, invalidates all other sessions for security
      Parameters:
      u - User whose password should be changed
      newPassword - New password to set
      Returns:
      False, if the current password doesn't match (no changes happen), true otherwise

    • deleteUserByAdmin

      public boolean deleteUserByAdmin (String username, User u) throws NoRightException
      Deletes user by admin
      Parameters:
      username - Username of user to delete
      u - An admin account
      Returns:
      true, if deletion was successful, false otherwise (not an admin account or username doesn't exist)

      NoRightException
